column5: t minus 46 hours to departure. It will be so nice to get out of this oppressive heat. I'll have a Minaki report for you guys in a couple weeks.

A previous post indicated you were buying a round in I Falls. Is that invitation good for where you live and work too?Good luck and have fun. Wheels up for LOTW on June 10 - first of 3 trips this season.
Have a great trip! I'm leaving for the Canadian side of Rainy Lake on June 4th. Can't wait! Scott
AAAH so close, i'll be in minaki june 8th so leave me a few of the bigger ones!!
I'll be on Wabakimi 6/1/10 - can't wait! Doesn;t look like snow this year.
I have a real good feeling about this year.The water was just like this in 07.Hardly any current and it allowed us to fish some place we couldn't with fast moving water.

I agree with you... the last couple of years have been a little "off". This warm up, I think, along with hopefully a good water level will bring things back the way they should be. Of course, I'm always optimistic.
